file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.3"

info:
  title: "Simulations Example"
  version: "1.0.0"

servers:
  - url: "/"

paths:
  "/simulations":
    post:
      operationId: "create_simulation"
      summary: "Create new simulation"
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/Simulation"
      responses:
        "201":
          description: "Simulation details"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Simulation"

    get:
      operationId: "list_simulations"
      summary: "List all available simulations"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "Simulations list"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: "array"
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/Simulation"
                nullable: true

components:
  schemas:
     Simulation:
      type: "object"
      properties:
        simulation_id:
          type: "string"
        encoded_payload_file_id:
          type: "string"
          nullable: true
        reconstructed_payload_file_id:
          type: "string"
          nullable: true
        dataset_id:
          type: "string"
        model_id:
          type: "string"
        simulation_metrics:
          type: "object"
          nullable: true
        batch_size:
          type: "integer"
          nullable: true
      required: ["simulation_id", "dataset_id", "model_id"]
